entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
